item.title: 소리(SoRi) - 만나고 싶다
item.description:
Now this girl
could’ve easily
Just been another girl
in my life
But she taught me
the meaning
Of the word lonliness
and I think
That’s why
I can’t forget her
I mean
she was next to me
And she just
disappeared
I would give up
my whole life
Just to see her
once more
Cause she’s
my everything

묻지 않을텐데
